title: Manifest Schema v2
description: Graph-based manifest for infrastructure orchestration. Nodes define VMs/CTs with parent references forming a deployment tree.

schema_version.description: Must be 2 for graph-based node format

pattern.description: Topology shape: flat (all on target host) or tiered (parent-child nesting)

default_mode.description: Default execution mode: push (SSH from controller) or pull (deferred)

nodes.description: List of nodes to deploy. parent=null means deployed on target host.

name.description: Node identifier (used as VM hostname and context key prefix)

type.description: Node type: vm (KVM), ct (LXC), pve (Proxmox VE host)

spec.description: FK to v2/specs/{value}.yaml - what this node should become

preset.description: FK to v2/presets/{value}.yaml - size preset (vm- prefixed)

image.description: Cloud image name (required for vm/pve types)

parent.description: FK to another node name. null or omitted = root node on target host.

mode.description: Override default execution mode for this node

verify_ssh.description: Verify SSH access at each node

timeout_buffer.description: Extra timeout seconds per nesting level

on_error.description: Error handling: stop (halt), rollback (destroy created), continue (skip failed)
